title: 524 8 "Deadly Combat Under the Sea! The Demon of the Ocean Strikes!"Transliteration: "Kaichū no Shitō - Arawareta Ōunabara no Akuma" (Japanese:海中の死闘 現れた大海原の悪魔) Aya Komaki Tomohiro Nakayama November 20, 2011(2011-11-20) February 13, 2022
transformers_text: 524 8 Deadly Combat Under the Sea The Demon of the Ocean Strikes Transliteration Kai ch no Shit A raw are ta una bara no A kuma Japanese Aya Ko maki Tomohiro Nakayama November 20 2011 2011 11 20 February 13 2022 After ramming his ship into the Thousand Sunny Caribou orders his men to attack but Moh moo frightened by Luffy's and Sanji's appearance flees with Caribou's crew The Straw Hats capture Caribou while introducing himself Nami tells the others if a ship goes straight it can be destroyed by a volcano or crash into a mountain and Us opp clarifies that the Grand Line's currents can be very dangerous Nami has the others put on jackets due to the deep sea's extreme cold temperatures It is also revealed that the sea levels can be referred to as the Deep Currents Just as they discuss about the currents the ship heads straight for the Downward Plume a massive undersea waterfall However they notice a large Kraken crushing ships for years and it destroys Caribou's ship seemingly killing his crew When Luffy prepares to attack the Kraken Caribou has Luffy Zoro and Sanji put on the Flutter Kick Coating suits allowing them to exit the bubble Chopper uses his Guard Point technique and Robin uses her Mil Fleur Gigantes co Mano technique to prevent the ship from taking any damage while Luffy Zoro and Sanji prepare to attack
